name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
ingredients: Spaghetti, eggs, Parmesan cheese, pancetta, black pepper, salt
instructions: Boil pasta. Cook pancetta until crispy. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all with pasta and pancetta off heat.

name: Chicken Curry
description: Spicy and flavorful chicken curry made with coconut milk and Indian spices.
ingredients: Chicken, onion, garlic, ginger, tomatoes, coconut milk, curry powder
instructions: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger. Add spices and chicken. Pour in tomatoes and coconut milk. Simmer until cooked.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: A quick and healthy stir-fried vegetable medley with soy sauce and garlic.
ingredients: Broccoli, bell pepper, carrots, snap peas, soy sauce, garlic, sesame oil
instructions: Heat oil. Stir-fry vegetables on high heat. Add soy sauce and garlic. Cook until tender-crisp.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Tacos with seasoned ground beef, cheese, and fresh toppings.
ingredients: Ground beef, taco seasoning, tortillas, lettuce, tomato, cheese, sour cream
instructions: Cook beef with seasoning. Warm tortillas. Assemble tacos with toppings.

name: Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes perfect for breakfast with syrup or fruit.
ingredients: Flour, eggs, milk, baking powder, sugar, salt, butter
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add wet ingredients and whisk. Pour batter onto griddle. Flip when bubbles form.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
description: Crispy golden grilled sandwich with melted cheese inside.
instructions: Butter bread. Place cheese between slices. Grill in pan until golden on both sides.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed in creamy Caesar dressing with croutons and cheese.
ingredients: Romaine lettuce, Caesar dressing, croutons, Parmesan cheese, lemon juice
instructions: Toss lettuce with dressing. Top with croutons and cheese. Squeeze lemon juice on top.

name: Baked Salmon
description: Oven-baked salmon fillet with lemon and herbs.
ingredients: Salmon fillet, lemon, garlic, olive oil, dill, salt, pepper
instructions: Place salmon in baking dish. Season with herbs and lemon. Bake at 400°F (200°C) for 15–20 minutes.

name: Tomato Soup
description: Creamy and rich tomato soup perfect for cold days.
ingredients: Tomatoes, onion, garlic, vegetable broth, cream, salt, pepper
instructions: Cook tomatoes, onion, and garlic. Blend and add broth and cream. Simmer until thickened.

name: Banana Smoothie
description: Refreshing smoothie with banana, yogurt, and honey.
ingredients: Banana, yogurt, milk, honey, ice cubes
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve cold.
